text: Lacuna Coil is an Italian gothic metal band. They started in 1994 in Milan with the name Sleep of Right. Then they changed their name to Ethereal in 1997. They found that there was already a band with that name. So they changed their name to Lacuna Coil that year. They are known for making music with male and female vocal harmonies. Cristina Scabbia joined the band in 1996. She does the main vocals with Andrea Ferro. The band has released seven albums. ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1994 establishments in Italy Category:1990s music groups Category:2000s music groups Category:2010s music groups Category:2020s music groups Category:Gothic metal bands Category:Italian musical groups Category:Musical groups established in 1994 Category:Musicians from Milan
title: Lacuna Coil
